text: Meghan Markle did a totally new thing on Friday, when she visited Northern Ireland with Prince Harry. She seemingly took a page out of Kate Middleton's fashion book and recycled a piece she's already worn! Getty Images Eagle - eyed fans spotted the fact that the Victoria Beckham sweater she wore at her most recent event looked suspiciously similar to the one she had on in her very cute engagement photos with Harry. Getty Images Honestly, it's kind of hard to tell something like that from this engagement picture, since you just see, like, one shoulder of the sweater.
